headline: LKQ’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: LKQ’s first quarter was met with a negative market reaction, as the company’s revenue fell short of Wall Street’s expectations while non-GAAP profit modestly exceeded analyst estimates. Management attributed the sales decline to ongoing softness in North American repairable claims, continued weakness in discretionary Specialty segments, and muted consumer sentiment in Europe. CEO Justin Jude highlighted that, despite these headwinds, the company gained market share in North America by outperform
